trans-unit.source: Forces the attributed object to be created in the context of the creator, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Força o objeto attributed a ser criado no contexto do criador, se possível.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: If the context attributes of the attributed object conflict with those of the context of the creator, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown when an attempt is made to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Se os atributos de contexto do objeto attributed entrarem em conflito com os do contexto do criador, um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName>é acionada quando é efetuada uma tentativa de criar o objeto.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, requiring creation of the object in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"> </xref> classe, que necessitam de criação do objeto no contexto do criador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, optionally not creating the object in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"> </xref> classe, opcionalmente, não a criar o objeto no contexto do criador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create the object in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para criar o objeto no contexto do criador; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the attributed object is to be created in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o objeto attributed está a ser criado no contexto do criador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is to be created in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto está a ser criado no contexto do criador; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
